TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXamlTypeResolver

summary.span: 代表從 XAML 標記中的具名項目解析成適當 CLR 類型的服務。

span.span: Represents a service that resolves from named elements in XAML markup to the appropriate CLR type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別主要供和做為服務作者，以判斷所需的建構 CLR 物件的 XAML 對 CLR 類型對應。The class is used primarily by and authors as a service to determine the XAML-to-CLR type mapping that is necessary for constructing a CLR object. 類型轉換器和標記延伸可以查詢XAML 物件寫入器叫用的值轉換行為時，會將 XAML 物件寫入器所提供的服務內容上以服務。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類型轉換器和 XAML 的標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)和[適用於類型轉換器和標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md). 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個介面會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type Resolve(string qualifiedTypeName) cil managed
Public Function Resolve (qualifiedTypeName As String) As Type

param.name: qualifiedTypeName
param.span: 要解析的 XAML 類型名稱。

span.span: The XAML type name to resolve.

param.span: 類型名稱可選擇性地以 XML 命名空間的前置詞限定，

span.span: The type name is optionally qualified by the prefix for a XML namespace.

param.span: 或假設為目前的預設 XML 命名空間。

span.span: Otherwise the current default XML namespace is assumed.

summary.span: 將具名 XAML 型別解析為對應的 CLR 。

span.span: Resolves a named XAML type to the corresponding CLR .
